pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Espressif Documentation Build SystemEsp-docs is a python based wrapper for the documentation building package Sphinx.It is intended to simplify and extend Sphinx's functionality to better suit what is needed for building documentation for Espressif's development frameworksProvides: * Functionality for building documentation for multiple targets (e.g. ESP32 and ESP32-C3) from the same rst source files. * Sphinx extensions used at Espressif * Scripts for deploying docsFor a more in-depth guide on how to install, write, and compile documentation please see [ESP-Docs User Guide](https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esp-docs/en/latest/index.html).
